generated_body: The article titled "Republicans are throwing Giuliani under the bus. Readers can expect an analysis of how party members are distancing themselves from Giuliani, potentially highlighting the implications this has for the party's cohesion and strategy moving forward. The article may also delve into the reasons behind this shift, suggesting that the party is grappling with the fallout from Giuliani's actions and how this could affect their political standing.
